name: Professional Indoor Air Quality Monitor with AQI Beep Alarms, Portable Real-Time Detector for Home Cars Plants and Pets
short_description: 【Professional 16-in-1 Real-time Air Quality Monitor】: With real-time detection of PM1.0 | PM2.5 | PM10 | CO2 | TVOC | HCHO | TEM | HUM, along with 7 kinds of AQI alert buzzers function, this monitor ensures you always know what's in the air around you.

【One-button Start & Double-click to Silence Alerts】: Simple one-touch controls make it easy to power on/off, switch between °C/°F, and silence alarms with just a press or double tap. Perfect for beginners and ideal for daily gas detection in any home.

【High-precision Sensor System & HD Large Display】: The high-precision sensor system continuously collects and analyzes air data every 3 seconds, providing you with constant updates on the air quality in your space. A clear and advanced color display enhances readability and adds a touch of sophistication to your environment.

【Up to 4h Run-Time & Fast-Charge】: Enjoy up to 4-5 hours of wireless operation on a single charge with the high-performance lithium battery. The included adapter and Type-C charging cable offer quick charging, allowing you to keep an eye on air quality around the clock.

【Versatile Carry Scenarios & Stylish Design】: With versatile mounting options and a sleek, modern design, the AQItech monitor seamlessly fits into any setting, from bedrooms and offices to cars and campsites. Ideal for home, car, nursery, and public space air quality testing, this monitor ensures you breathe easy wherever you are. Trust in the quality of AQItech and explore our full range of Air Quality Monitors with confidence. Enjoy a 12-month warranty for added peace of mind.

name: Air Quality Monitor, Professional Air Quality Detector with CO2 Monitor/HCHO/TVOC/Temperature/Humidity for Home, Hotel, Office, Car
short_description: 5 in 1 indoor air quality monitor, it tracks carbon dioxide (CO2), formaldehyde (HCHO), volatile organic compounds (TVOC), temperature and humidity, helping you stay aware of air quality and potential health risks.
Ideal for various settings including homes, offices, schools, and hotels, this monitor helps maintain a healthy environment by continuously tracking airborne pollutants and climate conditions.
Simple to set up and operate, making it accessible for anyone concerned about indoor air quality without the need for professional installation.

Up to 20 hours of continuous use, you don't need to keep it plugged in. This indoor air quality meter is small and portable, can detect the gas quality in bedroom, living room, kitchen, office, car, school, hotel, cellars, restaurant, campground and other environments.
By integrating advanced laser particle sensors with temperature and humidity sensors, making high-precision air quality monitoring more accessible than ever.

name: 12 in 1 Portable Air Quality Monitor Indoor for Home, Dual Air Quality Tester with Temperature, Humidity, Time Display, CO2 Detector Air Quality Meter for TVOC, PM2.5, PM1.0, PM10
short_description: 【Dual Chip & High-Precision】With the newly upgraded 5.0 Dual Chip, this indoor air quality monitor employs two independent but synergistic chips, one for processing data collected by the sensors and the other for managing the Air Quality Monitor's user interface. This processing not only improves the data processing speed, but also enhances the stability and accuracy of the data, ensuring the reliability of the measurement results

【12-in-1 Air Quality Monitor Indoor 】This multifunctional indoor air quality monitor is a very useful monitor which can monitor the air quality in your home at any time, whether it is for home or office use is ideal for you. The Air Quality Monitor’s array of sensors provides a wealth of information: CO2, TVOC, PM1.0, PM2.5, PM10 indication, Humidity, Temperature and time, it also has a CO2 alarm.This Air Quality Monitor Indoor is made of skin-friendly material with a very delicate texture

【CO2 Alarm & AQI Smiley Face】This CO2 Detector has a carbon dioxide alarm. This Air tester automatically triggers an alarm and buzzes when indoor carbon dioxide levels exceed a safe threshold. For example, mountain fires produce a lot of carbon dioxide, you can get useful information in time. When the CO2 Monitor index indicator is in the “GOOD” range, a smiley face will appear on the screen, and the smiley face slides to the left or right to help get a full picture of your air quality

【Portable & Widely Used】This Air Quality Tester For Home can be plugged in or used wirelessly, easy to carry and move, and can quickly switch between different environments for air quality testing. Helps detect gas and air pollution in home, kitchen, bedroom, office, school, car, hotel, travel, camping, party and other places, always protect you and your family to live in healthy air conditions

【Simple Operation】The Air Quality Monitor Indoor takes about a minute from opening the box to plugging it in and taking a reading. The humanized design of the buttons on the back allows you to set up and operate it in a simple and clear way with intuitive functions. The user manual that comes with it is detailed and informative. If you have any questions about the Indoor Air Quality Monitor, please take the initiative to contact us and we will answer them promptly

name: Amazon Smart Air Quality Monitor – Know your air, Works with Alexa
short_description: Know your air – Amazon Smart Air Quality Monitor makes it easy to understand what’s in your indoor air.
Track and measure – Keep tabs on 5 key factors: particulate matter (PM 2.5), volatile organic compounds (VOCs), carbon monoxide (CO), humidity, and temperature.
Stay informed – Get an indication of current air quality from the color-coded LED, and an easy-to-understand air quality score in the Alexa app anytime.
Get notifications – If Alexa detects poor air quality, you can get notifications on your phone or even announcements on Echo devices.
Enable Routines to turn your Alexa-enabled devices such as air purifiers, dehumidifiers, and fans on and off when the indoor air quality changes.
Maximize comfort - Keep different areas of your home more comfortable using the built-in temperature sensor with the Amazon Smart Thermostat.
Certified for Humans – Smart home made easy for non-experts. Setup with Alexa is simple.

name: Air Quality Monitor Indoor,8-in-1 Smart Air Quality Tester with CO2, TVOC, HCHO, AQI, Temperature & Humidity, Real Time Display, Battery Powered, for Home & Office (White)
short_description: Indoor Air Test Kits: This versatile indoor air quality detector can accurately measure real-time levels of AQI CO2 HCHO TVOC , temperature & humidity, alarm .

High Accuracy & Real-Time Data: With this smart sensor and double ventilation structure design, this indoor air quality monitor delivers precise data of your air quality, large detection range and small error,ensuring your peace of mind regarding the air you breath.

Easy to Read: This air quality tester has a large and colorful screen, a real-time display of 5 kinds of data, and a quick understanding of environmental conditions through different colors, making it effortless to interpret air quality data.

Long Time To Use: With a built-in 1200 mah battery, this air quality meter can work continuously for 9-10 hours and fully charged take 3-4 hours. With high capacity battery and type c cable, you could take it around your home, office, school, hotel or car as needed.

name: Temtop Air Quality Monitor Indoor Thermo-Hygrometer - PM2.5, AQI, Temperature, and Humidity Meter for Home, Office, or School, Air Quality Measurement, 60-Day Battery Life
short_description: Health Monitoring - The Indoor Air Quality Monitor tracks Temperature, Humidity, and PM2.5, helping you stay aware of air quality and potential health risks.
Energy Saving - Our innovative technology makes the Temtop S1 80% more energy-efficient than traditional devices, offering an impressive 60-day standby time, reducing the need for frequent charging.

Cost-Effective - By integrating advanced laser particle sensors with Sensirion temperature and humidity sensors, we've reduced production costs by 38%, making high-precision air quality monitoring more accessible than ever.
Easy to Use - Temtop S1 is battery-powered with a magnetic mount, allowing you to easily place it anywhere in your home and view real-time data effortlessly.

Ensure Fresh Air - The WHO recognizes PM2.5 as a category 1 carcinogen, posing potential health hazards. With the Temtop PM2.5 monitor S1, you can detect air quality in real-time, ensuring every breath you take is fresh and safe.
Tip - For real-time monitoring, we recommend keeping the device plugged in. This will enable real-time monitoring mode, providing you with the most accurate and timely air quality data.

name: SAF Aranet4 Home: Wireless Indoor Air Quality Monitor for Office or School (CO2, Temperature, Humidity and More) Portable, Battery Powered, E-Ink Screen, App for Configuration & Data History
short_description: BREATHE EASILY: Aranet4 CO2 meter measures CO2 levels, temperature, relative humidity, and atmospheric pressure in real-time, empowering you to make informed decisions for healthy ventilation. name: LifeBasis Air Quality Monitor Indoor, 11-in-1 Air Quality Detector with Stand, Real-Time Air Meter Test AQI, PM1.0, PM2.5, PM10, CO2, TVOC, HCHO, Particles, Temperature and Humidity, Dual Alert -Black
short_description: MULTIFUNCTION MONITORING: This indoor air quality monitor provides real-time monitoring of 11 crucial indexes including AQI, CO2, PM1.0, PM2.5, PM10, Particles, HCHO, TVOC, temperature and humidity, dual alarm system-visual and audible. Life Basis air quality monitor keeps you informed of current air quality levels at all times to guarantee the breath health of your family

HIGH-PRECISOIN SMART SENSOR: The air quality meter is equipped with NDIR infrared carbon dioxide sensor, laser particle sensor, semiconductor sensor, photoelectric sensor, temperature and humidity sensor, which responds quickly and sensitively, and provide accurate indoor air concentration

COLOR AND SOUND ALARM: The color of the icon corresponding to a single gas changes according to the gas concentration, which are Good(Green), Moderate Pollution(Yellow), Poor (Orange), Unhealthy (Red) four grades. When the Normal is exceeded, the device will emit a ticking alarm sound, the indicator light will flash continuously and the interface color will change. You can acquire in real time which gas is unsafe and take action accordingly to enhance the air quality

CLEAR DISPLAY SETTINGS: Life Basis Air Quality Monitor has a LCD screen display, each data is clear with color reminder , easy to understand. The screen brightness can be adjusted according to your needs, allowing you to understand the indoor air quality at a glance

LONG BATTERY LIFE: Equipped with a 2500mAh battery and Type-C Charging Port, easy to use and portable. Our air quality monitor provides up to 11-12 hours of continuous use on a full charge. With a low battery consumption processing chip, it enables uninterrupted air quality monitoring to safeguard you and your family's health

WIDE APPLICATION: This portable air quality monitor is suitable for testing the air quality in multiple indoor places such as living rooms, kitchens, basements, offices, planting rooms, and cars. Its compact design and ease of use make it the perfect solution for maintaining a healthy environment
